title: My Mac can only run the legacy download of League of Legends.
body: Every time I close LoL and try to launch it again it just bounces on the taskbar as an imageless program. However, when I download from the download page, it launches in Legacy mode and lets me update and play. I have no idea what the actual problem is but this happens all the time. Can I please get some help with this?

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like the Mac OS might be blocking the program from running because it doesn't have the proper administrator rights. Make sure league has the right [**admin privileges**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) and let me know if that helps or not!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aGEN1Noq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T00:28:47.843+0000)
>
> Ahhhh it sounds like the Mac OS might be blocking the program from running because it doesn't have the proper administrator rights. Make sure league has the right [**admin privileges**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) and let me know if that helps or not!

For a while, the game was working fine without changing anything. Suddenly, it stopped again and I came back to this and checked if I had permissions and I did. I have no idea whats wrong with it, but I guess it just randomly corrupts and won't let me open it normally?
